import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'../styles/SignUp.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SignUp=()=>{const[formData,setFormData]=useState({firstName:'',lastName:'',email:'',password:'',dni:'',address:'',city:''});const[error,setError]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setFormData({...formData,[name]:value});};const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const response=await axios.post('http://localhost:8080/api/auth/signup',formData);if(response.status===200){navigate('/login');// Redirect to login page after successful sign-up
